actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to appoint a chief executive officer for the Resolution Trust Corporation.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to authorize the President, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, to appoint the chief executive officer of the Resolution Trust Corporation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to appoint a chief executive officer for the Resolution Trust Corporation.
